title: List of newspapers in Bangladesh
text:
This list of newspapers in Bangladesh is a list of <a href="newspaper">newspaper</a>s printed and distributed in <a href="Bangladesh">Bangladesh</a>. Newspapers published in Bangladesh are written in <a href="Bengali%20language">Bengali</a> or English language versions. Most Bangladeshi daily newspapers are usually printed in broadsheets; few daily tabloids exist. Daily newspapers in Bangladesh are published in the capital, <a href="Dhaka">Dhaka</a>, as well as in major regional cities such as <a href="Chittagong">Chittagong</a>, <a href="Khulna">Khulna</a>, <a href="Rajshahi">Rajshahi</a>, <a href="Sylhet">Sylhet</a> and <a href="Barisal">Barisal</a>. All daily newspapers are morning editions; there are no evening editions in Bangladesh. Some newspapers offer online versions.
Monthly/weekly newspapers and magazines.
Monthly Bandhan-construction, Real estate, Interior & Architecture related Popular Monthly Magazine
News agencies.
Before 1972, news agencies in Bangladesh were local branches of international <a href="news%20agency">agencies</a>.
